newsitem.title: SLOVAKIA: Slovak c.bank crown/dollar fix at 34.351 (34.369).
newsitem.headline: Slovak c.bank crown/dollar fix at 34.351 (34.369).

text.p: The National Bank of Slovakia (NBS) fixed the crown at 34.351 to the dollar after Monday's fixing at 34.369, and at 19.025 to the mark from 19.168.
The crown fixing is announced daily at about 1140 CET (0940 GMT), and is within plus/minus 7.0 percent of a dollar/mark basket midpoint calculated at 1130 CET.
The above rates imply a deviation from the midpoint of -0.46 percent, after a deviation of -0.91 percent on Monday.
At the time of calculation, the crown was trading on the interbank market at -0.42 versus the basket.
